title: Panic and partying reign at SXSW amid Silicon Valley Bank’s collapse
description: Silicon Valley Bank's sudden collapse hasn't stopped the party at SXSW, but it's the topic of conversation and consternation for many.

title: How a tweet by a TV host became a new battle in the culture war engulfing the U.K.
description: What began as a tweet by a popular British soccer commentator comparing the language of the government’s new immigration plan to that of 1930s Germany has upended a leading sports program — once a politics-free haven of national unity — and erupted into a national argument over free speech.
